commit message: Drop tables if coming from an older db version than 23
Added option to set a bookmark on sleep timer
Dont use deprecated app prefix any more
Dont call baseApplication from different thread to avoid rare threading issues
Use transition only if we dont use a replacement cover. Else the transition will fail, leaving us with a wrong scaled image
Added a indicator which book is currently playing
Added check for non existing current book
Scroll to current position in onResume
Replace current playing widget with fab
